'''Daniel Falconer''' is a [[Weta Workshop]] designer who has worked on both [[The Lord of the Rings (film series)|''The Lord of the Rings'']] and [[The Hobbit (film series)|''The Hobbit'' films]]. He has also authored various [[Weta Workshop]] publications.

*'''[[2013]]''': ''[[The Hobbit: The Desolation of Smaug: Chronicles: Art & Design]]''
*'''[[2014]]''': ''[[Smaug: Unleashing the Dragon]]''
*'''[[2014]]''': ''[[The Hobbit: The Desolation of Smaug: Chronicles: Cloaks & Daggers]]''
*'''[[2014]]''': ''[[The Hobbit: The Battle of the Five Armies: Chronicles: Art & Design]]''
*'''[[2015]]''': ''[[The Hobbit: The Battle of the Five Armies: Chronicles: The Art of War]]''

*'''[[2025]]''': ''[[The Art of The Lord of the Rings: The War of the Rohirrim]]''
